page.title: 08ALLESTREE:POPULATION
page.content: THE AGE STRUCTURE OF ALLESTREE IS QUITE UNUSUAL FOR THERE IS A HIGH PROPORTION OF PEOPLE IN THE AGE GROUPS 10_19 & 60_74.THIS MAY BE DUE TO THE AGE OF THE HOUSES & THEIR STYLES.MOST OF THE HOUSES DATE BACK NO FURTHER THAN 20_25 YEARS,SO WHEN THEY WERE NEW THE GENERALLY RICHER "MIDDLE AGED" GROUPS WOULD BE THE ONES THAT COULD AFFORD THEM AND THEY ARE NOW ALL IN THE 60_74 AGE GROUP.THE 10_19 AGE GROUP IS SO LARGE BECAUSE THE COUPLES MOVING INTO A LARGER HOUSE 20_25 YEARS AGO WOULD HAVE DONE SO WITH THE INTENTION OF EXPANDING THEIR FAMILIES & THEY ARE THE RESULT.THE SMALLER "MIDDLE AGED" GROUPS MAY BE SO BECAUSE THERE IS NOW, VERY LITTLE INCENTIVE FOR THESE AGED PEOPLE TO MOVE INTO THIS SORT OF AREA
